task3 module¶

task3.summary(data, axis=0)[source]¶

This function computes mean and standard deviation of a dataset along the specified “axis”

Parameters:
  • data (numpy-array) – Dataset for calculations
  • axis (int) – Axis for mean and std calculation. Default 0
Returns:

2-tuple of mean and standard deviation values
Return type:

tuple
Raises:

ValueError – If data parameter is not a numpy-array
